mapper.update: update user set unickname = #{unickname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, upassword = #{upassword,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, uname = #{uname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, usex = #{usex,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, uidNumber = #{uidnumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, uphone = #{uphone,jdbcType=INTEGER}, uimage = #{uimage,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, uemail = #{uemail,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where uid = #{uid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select uid, unickname, upassword, uname, usex, uidNumber, uphone, uimage, uemail from user
select uid, unickname, uname, usex, uidNumber, uphone, uimage, uemail from user where unickname=#{unickname} and upassword=#{upassword}
